text: @jtimberlake @MNFreedomFund You do realize half of our city has been burned to the ground, right?  Businesses that were on there last leg due to COVID-19 had the rug pulled out from under them with looting and destruction of property.  A great number of these "protesters" are not here for the right reasons.
